Low_Kick.help: A quick low kick that deals minor damage, but knocks back the target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Fast

Crush.help: Your Crush can deal a moderate amount of damage, but most of all can knock your opponent off their feet, unable to attack again until they stand up. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

Smash.help: A slow but devastating attack, the Smash has a great chance of knocking your opponent down. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

Charged_Fist_Ground_Pound.help: The Abomination channels Dr. Kane's mad lightning into a vicious ground pound, sundering all those who stand in his way. Note that Charged Fist Ground Pound is unaffected by Range changes

Peg_Leg_Stomp_Lock.help: The Abomination must wind up its attack before unleashing its mighty Peg Leg Stomp. Recharge: Slow

Peg_Leg_Stomp_Tell.help: The Abomination must wind up its attack before unleashing its mighty Peg Leg Stomp.

Peg_Leg_Stomp.help: The Abomination's Piston-leg drives an earth-shattering blow into the ground, damaging and knocking back all those nearby. Note that Peg Leg Stomp is unaffected by Range changes

Tesla_Coil.help: Tesla Coil confines the target in an electrical prison. The target is overwhelmed by the electrical charge and is left helpless and can be attacked. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate
Tesla_Coil.targetHelp: The Tesla Coil is keeping you grounded.
